titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require the coverage of hospice care under medicaid plans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E86)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/6/1993--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require States to provide Medicaid coverage of hospice care.
